title: New Hire Security Training
description: A security awareness manager must ensure all new hires complete their mandatory security awareness training within 30 days of starting.

tasks.description: Automatically enroll all new hires into the security awareness training module in the Learning Management System (LMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: All new hires are successfully enrolled upon creation of their accounts.

tasks.description: Track the completion status of the training for all new hires.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager has a real-time dashboard of training completion rates.

tasks.description: Send automated reminders to new hires (and their managers) who have not completed the training as the 30-day deadline approaches.
tasks.expected_outcome: Reminders are sent automatically, improving the on-time completion rate.
